tool_description: Analyzes current inventory levels across multiple locations, providing stock status and availability insights for specified products and time ranges.

location_ids.description: List of warehouse/location identifiers to analyze

product_skus.description: List of product SKUs to check inventory for

error_messages: Invalid location ID: One or more location_ids do not exist in the system. Verify location identifiers.
Product SKU not found: One or more product_skus are invalid. Check SKU format and existence.
Invalid date format: analysis_date must be in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).
Future date error: analysis_date cannot be in the future. Use current or past dates only.
usage: Provide arrays of location_ids and product_skus to get current inventory levels. Optionally specify analysis_date for historical snapshots. Use this tool as the foundation for transfer planning and shortage detection.

total_locations_analyzed.description: Number of locations included in analysis

inventory_summary.description: Summary strings of inventory status per location-product combination

low_stock_alerts.description: Alerts for products with critically low inventory levels
